item.description:
Fashion's Night Out Boston Free Meetup at Copley Place's beautiful Center Court Meet Michelle McCormack and Richard Villani

When is Fashion's Night Out? September 8, 2011 from 6 - 11pm

What is Fashion's Night Out? Launched in 2009 as a partnership with VOGUE magazine and the Council of Fashion Designers of America, Fashion’s Night Out has become a global celebration.  The incredible success in the first year led to LA, London, and Milan participating last year. This year, Boston is being added to the list!
Just last week, Vogue told Richard and Michelle that FNO Boston's success in promoting the event have really 'raised the bar' for FNO worldwide!

Who are Michelle and Richard? Boston Natives, Michelle Mc Cormmack and Richard Villani are working officially with the City of Boston and the Conde Nast team in NYC to bring FNO to Boston for the first time this year. They spent 20 years living in the NYC magazine world and have moved back to Boston eager to bring the magic back home.

What you will learn at the Meetup Wednesday night:  Attendees will have the opportunity to hear event details directly from Boston's FNO leadership team, learn how you can attend the most exciting FNO events taking place in the city on September 8th, and learn how to stay abreast of event details via the FNO Boston website and other social media. Copley Place will provide an overview of the fabulous (and free!) fashion show they will hold to celebrate FNO as well as other events happening there on the 8th. Joseph Gualtiere and Kathy Benharris will share details regarding the after party at the Liberty Hotel and the "Fashionably Late Fashion Show".

As always, Boston Fashion Meetup members are encouraged to ask questions, bring their business cards, and network!

RSVP and reserve your spot - you are not going to want to miss this!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of the waterfall at Copley Place's beautiful Center Court
item.name: FREE BOSTON FASHION'S NIGHT OUT MEETUP @ COPLEY PLACE!
